response.overview: Join heroic Quartermain, the world's most thrilling adventure seeker, as he hunts for the treasure of King Solomon's Mines! Deep within a remote mountain somewhere in Africa lies the gold and endless riches of the legendary King Solomon. Many have tried to find the treasure - but none have succeeded! Now Allan Quartermain's determined to locate the bounty, but first he must battle the wild's of Africa and the ferocious Kukuana tribe - who are intent on keeping the treasure for themselves! It's an expedition in excitement and adventure that will have your whole family on the edge of their seats!
response.title: Storybook Classic's: King Solomon's Mines
